column5: My place is close to a variety of area restaurants and businesses. Convenient to Highway 183, I-20, and Chisholm Trail Parkway, living at my place provides easy access to downtown Fort Worth, just eight miles away. My place features a fireplace, screened-in patio, huge walk-in closet, a terrific community with two swimming pools, a 24-hour fitness center, and picnic areas with grills. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets).
